name: TheHive Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when TheHive events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 TheHive Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when TheHive events occur

notice.displayName: You must set up the webhook in TheHive — instructions here
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: You must set up the webhook in TheHive — instructions here

events.name: events
events.natural_language_description: 参数名: Events | 作用: Events types | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
available_options: * (值: *) - Any time any event is triggered (Wildcard Event)
Alert Created (值: alert_create) - Triggered when an alert is created
Alert Deleted (值: alert_delete) - Triggered when an alert is deleted
Alert Updated (值: alert_update) - Triggered when an alert is updated
Case Created (值: case_create) - Triggered when a case is created
Case Deleted (值: case_delete) - Triggered when a case is deleted
Case Updated (值: case_update) - Triggered when a case is updated
Log Created (值: case_task_log_create) - Triggered when a task log is created
Log Deleted (值: case_task_log_delete) - Triggered when a task log is deleted
Log Updated (值: case_task_log_update) - Triggered when a task log is updated
Observable Created (值: case_artifact_create) - Triggered when an observable is created
Observable Deleted (值: case_artifact_delete) - Triggered when an observable is deleted
Observable Updated (值: case_artifact_update) - Triggered when an observable is updated
Task Created (值: case_task_create) - Triggered when a task is created
Task Updated (值: case_task_update) - Triggered when a task is updated
